variable_arithmetic_trigger.description: Can use variable effects and triggers to compare or change and compare modifier and trigger values. "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections can include more "variable_arithmetic_trigger" sections. This has to be done for effects such as "change_variable" or effects of "if" sections inside the "variable_arithmetic_trigger", since the game may crash otherwise.
variable_arithmetic_trigger.comment: Only validates structure of the arithmetic trigger, not any of the values.

monthly_income.description: If monthly income is higher than X, or higher than scope Y.

num_of_regiments_at_full_drill.description: Number of regiments at full drill is higher than X.

num_of_captured_ships_with_boarding_doct.description: Number of captures ships is higher than X.

innovativeness.description: Value of innovativeness is higher than X.

army_professionalism.description: Value of army professionalism is X or higher.

num_of_different_religions_in_court.description: Number of different religions is X or higher.

num_of_different_cultures_in_court.description: Number of different cultures is X or higher.

num_of_trade_companies.description: Number of trade companies is X or higher.

custom_trigger_tooltip.description: Hides the enclosed condition so that it is still required but cannot be seen by human players and displays the specified tooltip in its place.

calc_true_if.description: Returns true if at least amount number of targets within the specified scope match the specified conditions

hidden_trigger.description: Hides the enclosed conditions so that they are still required but cannot be seen by human players.

mission_completed.description: If this mission is completed by this country.

owns_all_islands.description: If the country owns all the island..?

num_of_consorts.description: Number of consorts is X or higher.

is_free_or_tributary_trigger.description: If the country is free (independent) or a tributary.

is_subject_other_than_tributary_trigger.description: If the country is a subject, but not a tributary.

cb_on_religious_enemies.description: Modifier, check if country has it.

cb_on_government_enemies.description: Modifier, check if country has it.

has_leaders.description: If the country has at least X leaders matching the criteria.

has_mil_advisor.description: If the country has a military advisor.

has_adm_advisor.description: If the country has an administrative advisor.

has_dip_advisor.description: If the country has a diplomacy advisor.

has_mission.description: Check if scope tag has mission available.

is_statists_in_power.description: If the Statists are in power (Dutch government only).

owns_or_vassal_of.description: If the Statists are in power (Dutch government only).

has_religious_school.description: If the country has any religious school.

has_religious_school_of.description: If the country has the same religious school as target.

absolutism.description: Returns true if the country has at least X absolutism.

accepted_culture.description: Returns true if the country accepts the specified culture.

active_major_mission.description: Returns true if X is the current mission ot the country.

adm.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high administrative skill as the ruler of the specified country.

ADM.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high administrative skill as the ruler of the specified country.

adm_power.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much administrative power than the specified country.

adm_tech.description: Returns true if the country has an administrative technology of at least X.

advisor.description: Returns true if the country has an advisor of the specified type.

advisor_exists.description: Returns true if the advisor X exists.

ai.description: Returns true if the country is controlled by the AI.

ai_attitude.description: Returns true if the country has the specified attitude towards country X.

alliance_with.description: Returns true if the country has an alliance with X.

army_size.description: Returns true if the country has an army with at least as much soldiers than the specified country.

army_size_percentage.description: Returns true if the total army size of the country is at least X% of its land force limit.

army_strength.description: Returns true, if the country's army size is at least the size of X times the army size of the specified country.

army_tradition.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high army tradition as the specified country.

artillery_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the artillery fraction to the army size of the country is at least X.

at_war_with_religious_enemy.description: Returns true if the country is at war with any country of a different religion.

authority.description: Returns true if the Inti country has at least as much authority as the specified country.

average_autonomy.description: Returns true if the country has an average autonomy in its provinces of at least X.

average_home_autonomy.description: Returns true if the country has an average autonomy in its provinces excluding overseas provinces is at least X.

average_unrest.description: Returns true if the country has an average unrest in its provinces of at least X.

blockade.description: Returns true if the blockade penalty of the country is at least X%.

border_distance.description: Returns true if distance between the borders of the countries is at least X.

can_be_overlord.description: Returns true, if country meets the conditions defined in the subject type's [i]is_potential_overlord[/i] section.

can_create_vassals.description:
Returns true if the country can create a vassal.
Warning: Interprets anything after â€˜=â€™ as â€œyesâ€�.
Note: Works only for independent countries.

can_heir_be_child_of_consort.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s heir can potentially be the consortâ€™s child.

can_justify_trade_conflict.description: Returns true if the country can justify a trade conflict against country X.

capital.description: Returns true if the country's capital is the province with the ID X.

capital_distance.description: Returns true if distance between the capitals of the countries is at least X.

capital_trade_node.description: Returns true if trade node capital is X

cavalry_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the cavalry fraction to the army size of the country is at least X.

church_power.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much church power as the specified country.

coalition_target.description: Returns true if the country is the target of a coalition.

colony_claim.description: Returns true if country has claim on colony

consort_adm.description: Returns true if the country has a consort with an administrative skill of at least X.

consort_age.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s consort has an age of at least X.

consort_culture.description: Returns true, if the country's consort has the specified culture. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

consort_dip.description: Returns true if the country has a consort with an diplomatic skill of at least X.

consort_has_personality.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s consort has the specified personality.

consort_mil.description: Returns true if the country has a consort with an military skill of at least X.

consort_religion.description: Returns true, if the country's consort has the specified religion. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

controls.description: Returns true if the province with id X is controlled by the country.

core_claim.description: Returns true if the country has a core on any province owned by country X.

core_percentage.description: Returns true if the country has cored at least X% of its provinces.

corruption.description: Returns true if the country has a corruption of at least X.

culture_group.description: Returns true if the country/province has a culture of the specified culture group.

culture_group_claim.description: Returns true if country's primary culture is the same culture group as any province owned by country X.

current_debate.description: Returns true if the parliament of the country debates about X.

current_icon.description: Returns true, if the country has the specified (orthodox) icon.

current_institution_growth.description: Returns true, if the country/province has an institution growth of at least X for the first not embraced institution.

current_size_of_parliament.description: Returns true if the parliament of the country has a least X seats.

defensive_war_with.description: Returns true if the country is in a defensive war with country X.

development_of_overlord_fraction.description: Returns true, if the country has X percent of its overlord's development

devotion.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much devotion as the specified country.

dip.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high diplomatic skill as the ruler of the specified country.

DIP.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high diplomatic skill as the ruler of the specified country.

dip_power.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much diplomatic power than the specified country.

dip_tech.description: Returns true if the country has an diplomatic technology of at least level X.

diplomatic_reputation.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much diplomatic reputation as the specified country.

dominant_culture.description: Returns true if the dominant culture in the country is X.

dominant_religion.description: Returns true if the dominant religion in the country is X.

doom.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much doom than the specified country.

dynasty.description: Returns true if both countries are ruled by the same dynasty.

employed_advisor.description:
Returns true if the country has employed an advisor with the specified characteristics.
(Any combinations of type, home_religion and home_culture are permitted.)

estate_influence.description: Returns true if the estate X in the country has at least Y influence.

estate_loyalty.description: Returns true if the estate X in the country has at least Y loyalty.

estate_territory.description: Returns true if the estate X in the country controls at least Y% of the total development.

exists.description: Returns true if the scoped country exists.

faction_in_power.description: Returns true if the faction in power of the country is X.

faction_influence.description: Returns true if the faction X of the country has at least Y influence.

federation_size.description: Returns true if the federation with the country has at least X members.

fervor.description: Returns true if the country has stored at least X fervor points.

full_idea_group.description: Returns true if the country has completed the X idea group.

galley_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the galley fraction to the navy size of the country is at least X.

gold_income.description: Returns true if the country has an income from gold of at least X.

gold_income_percentage.description: Returns true if in the country the proportion of income from gold is at least X.

government.description:
Returns true if the country has government type X.
Note: can search for the 3 government groups (monarchy, republic, theocracy), for a specific government type (feudal_monarchy, absolute_monarchy, etc.) or tribal

government_rank.description: Returns true if the country has a government rank of X or higher.

great_power_rank.description: Returns true if the country has a great power rank of 2 or worse.

guaranteed_by.description: Returns true if the country is guaranteed by X.

had_active_policy.description: Returns true, if the country still has and had the specified policy for at least X days.

had_consort_flag.description: Returns true if the consort flag X was last set at least Y days ago

had_country_flag.description: Returns true if the country flag X was last set for the country at least Y days ago.

had_heir_flag.description: Returns true if the heir flag X was last set at least Y days ago

had_recent_war.description: Returns true if the country fought a war within the last X years.

had_ruler_flag.description: Returns true if the ruler flag X was last set for the current ruler at least Y days ago

harmonization_progress.description: Returns true, if the country's current harmonization progress is at least at X.

harmony.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X harmony.

has_active_debate.description: Returns true if the country has ongoing debate in parliament.

has_active_fervor.description: Returns true if the country has activated a fervor effect.

has_active_policy.description: Returns true if country has the specified policy active.

has_adopted_cult.description: Returns true if the country has adopted the specified cult.

has_advisor.description:
Returns true if the country has hired an advisor.
Warning: Inteprets every right side argument as yes.

has_age_ability.description: Returns true, if the country has the specified age ability.

has_any_disaster.description: Returns true if the country is currently in a disaster.

has_border_with_religious_enemy.description:
Returns true if the country borders any country of a different religion.
Warning: Interprets anything after â€˜=â€™ as â€œyesâ€�.

has_casus_belli.description: Returns true if the country has a casus belli of type X against country Y.

has_casus_belli_against.description: Returns true if the country has a casus belli against country X.

has_church_aspect.description: Returns true if the country has enabled the church aspect X.

has_colonial_parent.description: Returns true if the specified country is the colonial parent of the country.

has_commanding_three_star.description: Returns true, if country has a three star general.

has_consort.description: Returns true if the country has a consort.

has_consort_flag.description: Returns true if the consort flag X is set.

has_consort_regency.description: Returns true if the country has a consort regency.

has_country_flag.description: Returns true if the flag X is set for the country.

has_country_modifier.description: Returns true if the country has the modifier X.

has_custom_ideas.description: Returns true if the country has custom ideas.

has_disaster.description: Returns true if the country is currently in the disaster X.

has_disaster_progress.description: Returns true if the disaster progress of the specified disaster is at least X in the country.

has_discovered.description: Returns true if the country has discovered the province with the ID X.

has_divert_trade.description: Returns true if the protectorate has divert trade to its overlord.

has_embargo_rivals.description: Returns true if the subject nation is embargoing overlord's rivals.

has_estate.description: Returns true if the country has estate X.

has_estate_influence_modifier.description: Returns true if the estate X in the country has the influence modifier Y.

has_estate_loyalty_modifier.description: Returns true if the estate X in the country has the loyalty modifier Y.

has_faction.description: Returns true if the country has the specified faction.

has_factions.description: Returns true if country has factions.

has_female_consort.description: Returns true if the country has a female consort.

has_female_heir.description: Returns true if the country has a female heir.

has_foreign_consort.description: Returns true if the country has foreign consort.

has_foreign_heir.description: Returns true if the country has foreign heir.

has_friendly_reformation_center.description: Returns true if the country has a friendly center of reformation.

has_given_consort_to.description: Returns true if the scoped country has given a consort to the specified country.

has_global_modifier_value.description: Returns true if the value of the specified modifier is at least X for the country.

has_government_mechanic.description: Returns true, if the country uses the specified government mechanic.

has_guaranteed.description: Returns true if the country has guaranteed country X.

has_harmonized_with.description: Returns true, if the country has harmonized with the specified religion or religion group.

has_heir.description: Returns true if the country has an heir (named X).

has_heir_flag.description: Returns true if the heir flag X is set.

has_hostile_reformation_center.description: Returns true if the country has a hostile center of reformation.

has_idea.description: Returns true if the country has the X idea.

has_idea_group.description: Returns true if the country has chosen the X idea group.

has_institution.description: Returns true if the country has the specified institution.

has_leader.description: Returns true if the country has the leader "X".

has_leader_with.description:
Returns true if the country has a leader with at least the specified stats.
admiral = yes and general = yes can be used as further limitation.

has_matching_religion.description: Returns true if the countries have the same religion or syncretic faith.

has_new_dynasty.description: Returns true if the country has a new dynasty.

has_opinion.description: Returns true if the country has at least value opinion of the country specified by who.

has_opinion_diff.description: Returns true if opinion difference between country X and Y, is at least Z
has_opinion_diff.comment: TODO: Figure out what the structure is here (not used in game)

has_opinion_modifier.description:
Returns true if the country has the opinion modifier modifier towards the country specified by who.
Can also specify a value of the modifier (but it is not displayed).

has_parliament.description: Returns true if the country has a parliament.

has_personal_deity.description: Returns true if the ruler of the country has picked the specified personal deity.

has_privateers.description: Returns true if the country has privateers in any trade node.

has_promote_investments.description: Returns true if the country is promoting investments in the specified trade company (region).

has_regency.description: Returns true if the country has a regency.

has_removed_fow.description: Returns true if the country has lifted the fog of war from the specified country.

has_ruler.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler named "X".

has_ruler_flag.description: Returns true if the ruler flag X is set for the country.

has_ruler_modifier.description: Returns true the country has the modifier X until the ruler changes.

has_scutage.description: Returns true if the vassal pays scutage.

has_secondary_religion.description: Returns true if the county has a secondary religion.

has_send_officers.description: Returns true if the protectorate has received officers.

has_spawned_rebels.description: Returns true if rebels of the specified type are active in the country.

has_spawned_supported_rebels.description: Returns true if rebels which were supported by the secified country are active in the country.

has_spy_network_from.description: Returns true if the country X has a spy network of at least the specified size in the country.

has_spy_network_in.description: Returns true if the country has a spy network of at least the specified size in country X.

has_subsidize_armies.description: Returns true if the march has subsidizes armies.

has_support_loyalists.description: Returns true if the subject nation receives support for loyalists.

has_truce.description: Returns true if the country has truce.

has_unified_culture_group.description: Returns true, if the country owns all provinces of its culture group.

has_unit_type.description: Returns true if the country has selected unit type X as preferable unit.

has_unlocked_cult.description: Returns true if the country has unlocked the specified cult.

has_wartaxes.description: Returns true if the country has raised war taxes.

heavy_ship_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the heavy ship fraction to the navy size of the country is at least X.

heir_adm.description: Returns true if the country has an heir with an administrative skill of at least X.

heir_age.description: Returns true if the country has an heir that is at least X years old.

heir_claim.description: Returns true if the country has an heir with a claim strength of at least X.

heir_culture.description: Returns true, if the country's heir has the specified culture. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

heir_dip.description: Returns true if the country has an heir with a diplomatic skill of at least X.

heir_has_consort_dynasty.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s heir and consort have the same dynasty.

heir_has_personality.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s heir has the specified personality.

heir_has_ruler_dynasty.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s heir and ruler have the same dynasty.

heir_mil.description: Returns true if the country has an heir with a military skill of at least X.

heir_nationality.description: Returns true if the country has an heir with nationality X.

heir_religion.description: Returns true, if the country's heir has the specified religion. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

historical_friend_with.description: Returns true if the countries are historical friends.

historical_rival_with.description: Returns true if the countries are historical rivals

horde_unity.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much horde unity as the specified country.

in_golden_age.description: Returns true, if the country currently is in a golden age.

in_league.description: Returns true if the countries is in the X league.

incident_variable_value.description: Returns true, if the value of the specified incident is at least X.

infantry_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the infantry fraction to the army size of the country is at least X.

inflation.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much inflation as the country X.

institution_difference.description: Returns true if the country has embraced at least X more institutions than the specified country.

invested_papal_influence.description: Returns true if the country has invested at least X papal influence in the election of the next papal controller.

is_advisor_employed.description: Returns true if the advisor with the ID X is employed.

is_at_war.description: Returns true if the country is at war.

is_bankrupt.description: Returns true if the country is bankrupt.

is_claim.description: Returns true if the country has a claim on the province with the ID X.

is_client_nation.description: Returns true if the country is a client state.

is_client_nation_of.description: Returns true if the country is a client state of X.

is_colonial_nation.description: Returns true if the country is a non-independent colonial nation.

is_colonial_nation_of.description: Returns true if the country is a colonial nation of X.

is_core.description: Returns true if the country has a core on the province with the ID X.

is_crusade_target.description: Returns true if the country is the target of a crusade.

is_defender_of_faith.description: Returns true if the country is the defender of the faith.

is_dynamic_tag.description: Returns true, if the country is a dynamically created tag (e.g. client states).

is_elector.description: Returns true if the country is an elector of the HRE.

is_emperor.description: Returns true if the country is the emperor of the HRE.

is_emperor_of_china.description: Returns true if the country is the emperor of China.

is_enemy.description: Returns true the country views country X as an enemy.

is_excommunicated.description: Returns true if the ruler of the country is excommunicated.

is_federation_leader.description: Returns true if the country is a federation leader.

is_female.description: Returns true if ruler of the country is female.

is_force_converted.description:
Returns true if country has been force-converted via either religious rebels or an Enforce Religion peace treaty.
Note: The subject interaction Enforce Religion does not cause the subject to be considered as force-converted.

is_former_colonial_nation.description: Returns true if the country is a colonial nation that has gained independence.

is_great_power.description: Returns true if the country is a great power.

is_harmonizing_with.description: Returns true, if the country is currently harmonizing with the specified religion or religion group.

is_heir_leader.description:
Returns true if the heir of the country is a general.
Note: Proper localisation for the negation only with NOT = â€¦.

is_in_coalition.description: Returns true if the country is in a coalition.

is_in_coalition_war.description: Returns true if the country is fighting a coalition war.

is_in_deficit.description: Returns true if the country is running a deficit.

is_in_league_war.description: Returns true if the country is in a religious league war.

is_in_trade_league.description: Returns true if the country is a member of a trade league.

is_in_trade_league_with.description: Returns true if the country is a member of the same trade league as country X.

is_in_war.description:
Returns true if the country is at war and the mentioned conditions are fulfilled.
Possible are: attacker_leader, defender_leader, casus_belli, defenders, attackers, participants, war_score, start_date, duration, war_goal_province.

is_incident_active.description: Returns true, if the specified incident is active.

is_incident_happened.description: Returns true, if the specified incident already happened.

is_incident_possible.description: Returns true, if the specified incident can possibly happen.

is_incident_potential.description: Returns true, if the specified incident is visible and therefor can happen in the future.

is_league_enemy.description: Returns true if country X is league enemy of the country('s league).

is_league_friend.description: Returns true, if the country is in the same religious league as the specified country.

is_league_leader.description: Returns true if the country leads a religious league.

is_lesser_in_union.description: Returns true if the country is the lesser partner in a personal union.

is_march.description: Returns true if the country is a march.

is_monarch_leader.description:
Returns true if the rulerof the country is a general.
Note: Proper localisation for the negation only with NOT = â€¦.

is_neighbor_of.description: Returns true if the country is neighbor of X.

is_nomad.description:
Returns true if country's government is nomadic.
(Note: Only the Steppe Nomads government is flagged as nomadic.)

is_orangists_in_power.description: Returns true if in the country the orangists are in power.

is_origin_of_consort.description: Returns true if the specified country is the origin country of the scoped countryâ€™s consort.

is_overseas_subject.description: Returns true if the subject is overseas.

is_papal_controller.description: Returns true if the country is the papal controller.

is_part_of_hre.description: Returns true if the country/province is part of the HRE.

is_permanent_claim.description: Returns true if the province is a permanent claim of current country.

is_playing_custom_nation.description: Returns true if the country is a player-designed custom nation.

is_possible_march.description: Returns true if vassal X is a possible march of the country.

is_possible_vassal.description: Returns true if country X is releasable as vassal of the country.

is_previous_papal_controller.description: Returns true if the country is the previous papal controller.

is_protectorate.description: Returns true if the country is a protectorate

is_religion_reformed.description: Returns true if the country has reformed their religion.

is_revolution_target.description: Returns true if the country is the revolution target.

is_rival.description: Returns true if country X is a rival of the country.

is_state_core.description: Returns true if the country has a state core on the province with the ID X.

is_subject.description: Returns true if the country is a subject.

is_subject_of.description: Returns true if the country is a subject of X.

is_subject_of_type.description: Returns true if the country is a subject of subject type.

is_territorial_core.description: Returns true if the country has a territorial core on the province with the ID X.

is_threat.description: Returns true if country X is threatened by the country.

is_trade_league_leader.description: Returns true if the country is the leader of a trade league.

is_tribal.description:
Returns true if the country has a tribal government.
(Note: Government types that allow migration are not considered tribal.)

is_vassal.description: Returns true if the country is a vassal.

isolationism.description: Returns true, if the country has a isolationism level of at least X.

janissary_percentage.description:
Returns true if the country has an army of at least X k janissaries.
 Available only with the Cradle of Civilization DLC enabled.

junior_union_with.description: Returns true if the country is the junior partner in a personal union under country X.

karma.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much karma as the specified country.

knows_country.description: Returns true if the country has knowledge of country X.

land_forcelimit.description: Returns true if the country has a land force limit of at least as much regiments than the specified country.

land_maintenance.description: Returns true if the country has set its land maintenance to X.

land_morale.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high morale of armies as the specified country.

last_mission.description: Returns true if the last mission of the country was the specified mission.

legitimacy.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much legitimacy as the specified country.

legitimacy_equivalent.description: Returns true, if the country has at least as much legitimacy equivalent (legitmacy, republican tradition, devotion, horde unity, meritocracy etc.) as the specified country.

legitimacy_or_horde_unity.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much legitimacy or horde unity as the specified country.

liberty_desire.description: Return true if the subject has a liberty desire of at least X.

light_ship_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the light ship fraction to the navy size of the country is at least X.

luck.description: Returns true if the country is a lucky nation. (AI controlled counties only.)

manpower.description: Returns true if the country has at least  available manpower.

manpower_percentage.description: Returns true if the country has a manpower level of at least X%.

march_of.description: Returns true if the country is a march under country X.

marriage_with.description: Returns true if the country has a royal marriage with X.

max_manpower.description: Returns true if the country has at least  maximum manpower.

mercantilism.description: Returns true if the country's mercantilism is at least X.

meritocracy.description: Returns true, if the country has a meritocracy value of at least X.

mil.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high military skill as the ruler of the specified country.

MIL.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler with at least as high military skill as the ruler of the specified country.

mil_power.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much military power than the specified country.

mil_tech.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high monthly income as the specified country.

militarised_society.description: Returns true if the country has a militarization of country of at least X.

military_strength.description: Returns true, if the country's military strength (army size & navy size combined) is at least the size of X times the military strength of the specified country

months_of_ruling.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler that has ruled for at least X months.

nation_designer_points.description: Returns true if at least X points were used when creating the custom nation.

national_focus.description: Returns true if country has set the national focus to X.

naval_forcelimit.description: Returns true if the country has a naval force limit of at least as much ships than the specified country.

naval_maintenance.description: Returns true if the country's naval maintenance slider is at least X fraction of maximum.

naval_morale.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high morale of navies as the specified country.

naval_strength.description: Returns true, if the country's navy size is at least the size of X times the navy size of the specified country.

navy_size.description: Returns true if the country has a navy tradition as much ships than the specified country.

navy_size_percentage.description: Returns true if the ratio of the total navy size of the country to its naval force limit is at least X.

navy_tradition.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high navy tradition as specified country.

num_accepted_cultures.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X accepted cultures.

num_of_active_blessings.description: Returns true if the country has enabled at least X blessings.

num_of_admirals.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much admirals than the specified country.

num_of_admirals_with_traits.description: Returns true if the country has at least X admirals with traits.

num_of_allies.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much allies than the specified country.

num_of_artillery.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much artillery regiments than the specified country.

num_of_aspects.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much church aspects than the specified country.

num_of_banners.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X banner units.

num_of_cardinals.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much cardinals than the specified country.

num_of_cavalry.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much cavalry regiments than the specified country.

num_of_cities.description: Returns true if the country owns at least as much cities than the specified country.

num_of_coalition_members.description: Returns true if the country is in a coalition of at least X members.

num_of_colonies.description: Returns true if the country has at least X unfinished colonies.

num_of_colonists.description: Returns true if the country has at least X colonists.

num_of_conquistadors.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much conquistadors than the specified country.

num_of_continents.description: Returns true, if the country owns provinces on at least X continents. Only provinces owned by the country itself are taken into account, not provinces owned by subjects.

num_of_cossacks.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X cossack units.

num_of_custom_nations.description: Returns true if there are at least X custom nations in the game.

num_of_diplomatic_relations.description: Returns true if the country has at least X diplomatic relations.

num_of_diplomats.description: Returns true if the country has at least X diplomats.

num_of_explorers.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much explorers than the specified country.

num_of_free_diplomatic_relations.description: Returns true if the country has at least X free diplomatic relations slots.

num_of_galley.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much galleys than the specified country.

num_of_generals.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much generals than the specified country.

num_of_generals_with_traits.description: Returns true if the country has at least X generals with traits.

num_of_harmonized.description: Returns true, if the country has harmonized with at least X religions or religion groups.

num_of_heavy_ship.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much heavy ships than the specified country.

num_of_infantry.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much infantry regiments than the specified country.

num_of_light_ship.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much light ships than the specified country.

num_of_loans.description: Returns true if the country has taken at least as much loans than the specified country.

num_of_marches.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much marches than the specified country.

num_of_mercenaries.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much mercenaries than the specified country.

num_of_merchants.description: Returns true if the country has at least X merchants.

num_of_missionaries.description: Returns true if the country has at least X missionaries.

num_of_owned_and_controlled_institutions.description: Returns true, if the country owns and controlls at least X provinces that are institution origins.

num_of_owned_provinces_with.description: Returns true if at least X provinces of the scoped country match the specified condition(s).

num_of_ports.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much home ports than the specified country.

num_of_ports_blockading.description: Returns true if the country blockades at least X ports.

num_of_powerful_estates.description: Returns true if the country has at least X estates with at least 70 influence.

num_of_protectorates.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much protectorates than the specified country.

num_of_provinces_in_states.description: Returns true if the country has at least X provinces is states.

num_of_provinces_in_territories.description: Returns true if the country has at least X provinces is territories.

num_of_rebel_armies.description: Returns true if there are at least as much rebel armies in the country than the specified country.

num_of_rebel_controlled_provinces.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much rebel controlled provinces than the specified country.

num_of_religion.description:
Float value: Returns true if the ratio of the provinces with the specified religion to the total provinces of the country is at least X.
Integer value: Returns true if the country has at least X provinces with the specified religion.
It is also possible to specify the secondary religion by secondary = yes.

num_of_revolts.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much rebel controlled provinces than the specified country.

num_of_royal_marriages.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much royal marriages than the specified country.

num_of_states.description: Returns true if the country has at least X states.

num_of_streltsy.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X streltsy units.

num_of_strong_trade_companies.description: Returns true if the country has at least X strong trade companies.

num_of_subjects.description: Returns true if the country is the overlord of at least X subject countries of any type.

num_of_territories.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X territories (areas that aren't states).

num_of_total_ports.description: Returns true if the country owns at least as much total ports than the specified country.

num_of_trade_embargos.description: Returns true if the country has at least X trade embargos.

num_of_trading_bonuses.description: Returns true if the country hasat least X â€˜trading inâ€™ bonuses.

num_of_transport.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much transports than the specified country.

num_of_trusted_allies.description: Returns true if the country has at least X allies with 100 trust.

num_of_unions.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much personal unions than the specified country. Note: this no longer works. personal_union = x is the new format, eg personal_union = 2.

num_of_unlocked_cults.description: Returns true if the country has unlocked at least X cults.

num_of_vassals.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much vassals than the specified country.

num_of_war_reparations.description: Returns true if the country receives war reparations from at least as much countries than the specified country.

num_ships_privateering.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much ships privateering than the specified country.

offensive_war_with.description: Returns true if the country is in an offensive war with country X.

overextension_percentage.description: Returns true if country has at least X% overextension.

overlord_of.description: Returns true if the country is the overlord of X.

overseas_provinces_percentage.description: Returns true if the country has X percentage of overseas provinces.

owns.description: Returns true if the country owns the specified province.

owns_core_province.description: Returns true if the country owns and has a core on the specified province.

owns_or_non_sovereign_subject_of.description: Returns true, if the country or a subject that is not categorized as "sovereign" (e.g. tributary states are excluded) owns the specified province.

owns_or_subject_of.description: Returns true, if the country or a subject owns the specified province.

papal_influence.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much papal influence as the specified country.

patriarch_authority.description: Returns true if the country's patriarch authority is at least X.

percentage_backing_issue.description: Returns true if at least the Xth part of the seats in the parliament is backing for the current issue.

personality.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler which personality is X.

piety.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much piety as the specified country.

preferred_emperor.description: Returns true if an elector has the country X is the preferred emperor.

prestige.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much prestige as the specified country.

primary_culture.description: Returns true if the country's primary culture is X.

primitives.description: Returns true if the country is primitive.

production_efficiency.description: Returns true if the country has an at least as high production efficiency as the specified country.

production_income_percentage.description: Returns true if the ratio of production income to total income is at least X.

production_leader.description: Returns true if the country is the production leader of the trade good X.

provinces_on_capital_continent_of.description: Returns true if the country has a province on the continent with the capital of the specified country.

religion.description:
Returns true if the country/province has religion X.
Note: Within province scope religion = secondary returns true if the province religion matches the secondary/syncretic religion of the owner.

religion_group.description: Returns true if the country/province has a religion of the specified religious group.

religion_group_claim.description: Returns true if the country has the same religion group as country X

religious_school.description: Returns true, if the country has the specified religious school.
religious_school.todo: Add religious schools as a type?

religious_unity.description: Returns true if the country's religious unity is at least X.

republican_tradition.description: Returns true if country's republican tradition is at least X.

revanchism.description: Returns true if country's revanchism is at least X.

reverse_has_opinion.description: Returns true if the country specified by who has at least value opinion of the country.

reverse_has_opinion_modifier.description:
Returns true if the country specified by who has the opinion modifier modifier towards the country.
Can also specify a value of the modifier (but it is not displayed).

revolt_percentage.description: Returns true if at least the Xth part of the provinces of the country have revolts.

ruler_age.description: Returns true if the country has a ruler that is at least X years old.

ruler_culture.description: Returns true, if the country's ruler has the specified culture. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

ruler_has_personality.description: Returns true if the countryâ€™s ruler has the specified personality.

ruler_is_foreigner.description: Returns true if the country has foreign ruler.

ruler_religion.description: Returns true, if the country's ruler has the specified religion. Can utilise Event Scope Values.

sailors.description: Returns true if the country has at least X sailors.

sailors_percentage.description: Returns true if the country has a sailor level of at least X%.

same_continent.description: Returns true, if specified provinces are on the same continent. If used in country scope, capitals are checked.

secondary_religion.description: Returns true the secondary religion of the country is X.

senior_union_with.description: Returns true if the country is the senior partner in a personal union over country X.

splendor.description: Returns true, if the country has at least X splendor.

stability.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much stability than the specified country.

statists_vs_orangists.description: Returns true if Statists vs Orangists is at least X.

subsidised_percent_amount.description: Returns true if the country receives subsidies of at least X% of its monthly income.

succession_claim.description: Returns true if the country has claimed the throne of the country X.

tag.description: Returns true if the country is the specified country.

TAG.description: Returns true if the country is the specified country.

tariff_value.description: Returns true if the colonial nation pays at least X% tariffs.

tax_income_percentage.description: Returns true if the ratio of tax income to total income is at least X.

tech_difference.description: Returns true if the scoped country is at least X technologies ahead (compared to the country).

technology_group.description: Returns true if the countries have the same technology group.

tolerance_to_this.description: Returns true if the country has a tolerance of at least X towards the religion of the country or scoped province.

total_base_tax.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much total base tax as the specified country.

total_development.description: Returns true if the country has a total development of at least X.

trade_efficiency.description: Returns true if the country has a trade efficiency over X.

trade_embargo_by.description: Returns true if country X is embargoing the country.

trade_embargoing.description: Returns true if the country is embargoing country X.

trade_income_percentage.description: Returns true if the ratio of trade income to total income is at least X.

trading_bonus.description: Returns true if the country has the â€˜trading inâ€™ bonus of the specified trade good.

trading_part.description: Returns true if the country has access to X% of the world market of the specified trade good.

trading_policy_in_node.description: Returns true, if the country has the specified trading policy in the specified trade node. Can also use "policy = any".

transport_fraction.description: Returns true if the ratio of the transport fraction to the navy size of the country is at least X.

treasury.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much ducats in its treasury as the specified country.

tribal_allegiance.description: Returns true, if the country has a tribal allegiance of at least X.

truce_with.description: Returns true if the country has a truce with X.

unit_type.description: Returns true if the country has units of type X.

uses_authority.description: Returns true if the country uses authority mechanics.

uses_blessings.description: Returns true if the country uses blessings mechanics.

uses_church_aspects.description: Returns true if the country uses church aspects mechanics.

uses_cults.description: Returns true if the country uses cults mechanics.

uses_devotion.description: Returns true, if the country uses devotion instead of legitimacy.

uses_doom.description: Returns true if the country uses doom mechanics.

uses_fervor.description: Returns true if the country uses fervor mechanics.

uses_isolationism.description: Returns true, if the country uses the isolationism mechanic.

uses_karma.description: Returns true if the country uses karma mechanics.

uses_papacy.description: Returns true if the country uses papacy mechanics.

uses_patriarch_authority.description: Returns true if the country uses patriarch authority mechanics.

uses_personal_deities.description: Returns true if the country uses personal deities mechanics.

uses_piety.description: Returns true if the country uses piety mechanics.

uses_religious_icons.description: Returns true, if the country uses religious icons.

uses_syncretic_faiths.description: Returns true if the country uses syncretic faiths mechanics.

vassal_of.description: Returns true if the country is a vassal of country X.

war_exhaustion.description: Returns true if the country has at least as much war exhaustion as the specified country.

war_score.description: Returns true if the coutry has a warscore of at least X%.

war_score_against.description: Returns true if the coutry has a warscore of at least X against the specified country.

war_with.description: Returns true if the country is at war with country X.

was_player.description: Returns true if the country was controlled by a human player.

will_back_next_reform.description: Returns true if the member of the HRE is backing the next imperial reform.

yearly_corruption_increase.description: Returns true if the country has a yearly corruption increase of at least X.

years_in_union_under.description: Returns true if the country is in a personal union under the specified country for at least X years.

years_in_vassalage_under.description: Returns true if the country is a vassal of the specified country for at least X years.

years_of_income.description: Returns true if the country's treasury contains ducats of at least the yearly income of the specified country.
